nodes.goal: Isolate the first equation by moving all terms to one side
nodes.plan: Apply algebraic manipulation to combine like terms and move constants to the right side

nodes.goal: Isolate variable c in the first equation
nodes.plan: Use algebraic manipulation to isolate c on one side of the equation

nodes.goal: Eliminate c from both equations by substitution or elimination
nodes.plan: Use algebraic manipulation to eliminate c and obtain an equation with only r as the variable

nodes.goal: Isolate the second equation by moving all terms to one side
nodes.plan: Apply algebraic manipulation to combine like terms and move constants to the right side

nodes.goal: Isolate variable c in the second equation
nodes.plan: Use algebraic manipulation to isolate c on one side of the equation
